meanings.definition: The wood of a nut-bearing tree.
meanings.sent1: The table was made of sturdy nutwood.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crafted a beautiful shelf from nutwood.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used nutwood to build a tiny house.
meanings.sent4: The nutwood seemed to whisper stories of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of nutwood filled the room, bringing a sense of nature indoors.

meanings.sent1: The nutwood in the backyard provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted a new nutwood in the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The nutwood tree waved its branches in the wind, showering nuts on passersby.
meanings.sent4: The nutwood stood tall, its branches heavy with ripe nuts.
meanings.sent5: The nutwood tree was a favorite spot for the children to gather nuts in the fall.
